data.text: @TheCaptainPogo People only want to look at the surface of a statement, never further. Doing this that requires work, comprehension skills, and complex upper-level thought processing. Skills sadly lacked by many.

It’s crazy unfortunate that his recent @netflix special came out the day of a huge school shooting.  Still, look how this white kid was politely arrested compared to how they treat a black man selling loose cigarettes.

Nobody wants any dead kids.  Making jokes about the disproportionate amount of black deaths should make you uncomfortable, because it’s part of some dark racist bullshit in our country.  He has a right to express his frustration with the situation.
@TheCaptainPogo @chrisrock I want as many @chrisrock s as there are #whitepeople getting away with #murder
